overview: First Day of Animelo Summer Live 2015 - THE GATE -.  One of the world's largest animation live performances at the Saitama Super Arena Took place over 3 days from 28th (Fri) to 30th (Sun).  Featuring: Konomi Suzuki, Maon Kurosaki, Yuka Iguchi and many more!
title: Animelo Summer Live 2015 -THE GATE- 8.28
